Raconteur | full-time developer position onsite | London (E1)

https://www.raconteur.net/careers/web-developer-london

We are on the lookout for a web developer to support our digital team with a growing task list in managing our two websites (and ) as well as developing digital solutions for the marketing department and for our clients. You will be working closely with our lead developer and be managed by our Head of Digital.

Main responsibilities:

Help with development work on our internal projects as well as the development of:

Microsites Landing pages for our PPC campaigns Interactive Infographics/Charts Email templates Online advertising (DFP) WP themes / plugins CRM system integration

Skills Required: PHP WordPress CSS / SASS Javascript / jQuery / ES5 / ES6 Javascript MVC frameworks like React, Vue or Angualr (optional) Gulp / Grunt Git Composer LAMP / LEMP / Docker stacks

If interested, please send CV To Will Brookes (wb@raconteur.net).
